name: Dottie Flowers
summary: Dottie Flowers is a Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) game created by the indie developer Goldlocke. This charming platformer was released as a physical cartridge for the SNES/Super Famicom, and the digital version released on the 1st March 2024

videos.name: Gameplay Trailer
videos.title: New SNES game: Dottie Flowers - 60fps Gameplay!
